name: Rebirth
description: You are the survivor of this post-apocalyptic world. You will search for food, gun, and medicine for keeping yourself alive. But it is not that easy. zombies are everywhere. So you have to be careful and alert all the time because they are dangerous. They can smell and feel you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 635, AMD Radeon HD 5670 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 25 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960)/ AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 25 GB available space
